title: Cowboy Tough
description: She’s hardly a cowgirl…Cat Crendall left a successful advertising job in New York to teach art workshops in the wild west. The Boyd Ranch is hardly her dream destination, but if the outing’s a success, the company will send her to more exotic locations.But once a cowboy…Mack Boyd was in the middle of the best bronc-riding season of his life when his mother asked for help with an artists’ retreat at the ranch. Mack might be able to ride a wild stallion to a standstill but he can’t say no to his family.Cat and Mack are complete opposites…but when the ranch is threatened financially, can they set aside their differences and work together?
author: Joanne Kennedy
